name: claudebar
description: A bash statusline for Claude Code
author: Kevin Maes

scripts.version: changeset version && VERSION=$(grep -o '"version": "[^"]*"' package.json | head -1 | cut -d'"' -f4) && sed -i.bak "s/CLAUDEBAR_VERSION=\"[^\"]*\"/CLAUDEBAR_VERSION=\"$VERSION\"/" statusline.sh && rm -f statusline.sh.bak
